attributes.action: Sentance those responsible to Baby Ps Death to be Charged with Murder and Get them the life sentance whcih they gave that Poor Baby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After reading the details about the suffering and injuries sustained by such a lovely looking boy it sickens me that after only a few years these animals who done this too him will be freed!!! How can u do this? It will show people that it is okay too do this to there Children.  Put a stop to this and punish them 4 wot they did 2 poor Baby P. They should have done to them wot they put poor Baby P through and as that cant be done, please make the sentance a life one as that is the least they deserve!!!!!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
